name: Yosul
description:
Use magic blocks effectively and strategically!
Try your own magic in the grid world!!

Simple, but Addictive
Magic Blocks Game, YOSUL by 111%

Magical Features:
● Powerful skills activated when the gauge fills up.
● You can create your own special shape magic.
● Easy and fun to play.
● Colorful UI, Fun sound effects, Attractive magic design.
